songs.title: The Valley
songs.lyrics:
[Verse 1]
Baby, I just want you to know
There's no need to hide
(There's no need to hide it, no no no)
Say goodbye to all of the times
That we use to share, girl
I never meant to let you down
I just couldn't be around
Girl, I don't believe were meant to be
I knew it from the start
I just wanna see you fly
I don't wanna waste your time
Living in a dream of someone
Who is reaching for the sky

[Chorus]
Girl, I don't wanna waste your time
Go ahead and live your life
Baby, just keep going
Just keep going
Girl, I don't wanna waste your time
Go ahead and live your life
Baby, just keep going
Just keep going

[Post-Chorus]
Better know what you're doing, girl, don't make mistakes
'Cause when life brings you down, it's too late to frown
All the lesson you learned, girl, don't take them for granted
When life brings you down, it's too late to frown

[Verse 2]
See you don't gotta trip
I'm just tryna say how I feel
You know I'm on the run for the mill'
I'm keeping it real
And I don't mean to push you away
I'm tryna rise up on my level, no more minimum wage
But baby, keep grinding, keep shining
Baby, keep it moving, don't you ever look behind ya
Lil' mama, dry your eyes, baby don't cry
I'm just tryna say goodbye

[Chorus]
Girl, I don't wanna waste your time
Go ahead and live your life
Baby, just keep going
Just keep going
Girl, I don't wanna waste your time
Go ahead and live your life
Baby, just keep going
Just keep going

[Post-Chorus]
Better know what you're doing, girl, don't make mistakes
'Cause when life brings you down, it's too late to frown
All the lesson you learned, girl, don't take them for granted
When life brings you down, it's too late to frown
